body: This one, like all your doujinshis, is crap, stop putting mashu as if it were a bitch when not even when he lost his memory did that furry allow himself to be tempted, he even beat him up when he tried to go too far, I'm ahartoq eu always in his little doujins do the same with her, do you have so much hate towards a character to do this kind of crap? get a real job instead of doing this shit
